amendment.description: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for the Screening Partnership Program by $31.810 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 8 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the Screening Partnership Program by $31,810,000 and to reduce funding for aviation security by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Mr. Mica.
